data.trans_hint: Họ sẽ trồng một cây ổi vào mùa hè này.
data.en_hint: They will plant a guava tree this summer.
data.content_game_1: They will plant a guava tree this summer.
data.answer_en_hint: They will plant a guava tree this summer.

data.trans_hint: Rễ cây càng dài thì cây càng khỏe mạnh.
data.en_hint: The longer the roots are, the healthier the trees will be.
data.content_game_1: The longer the roots are, the healthier the trees will be.
data.answer_en_hint: The longer the roots are, the healthier the trees will be.

data.trans_hint: Người ta thường chặt những cành cây to vào mùa mưa bão.
data.en_hint: The big branches are often cut down in rainy season.
data.content_game_1: The big branches are often cut down in rainy season.
data.answer_en_hint: The big branches are often cut down in rainy season.

data.trans_hint: Lá cây thường rụng nhiều vào mùa thu.
data.en_hint: Tree leaves usually fall a lot in the fall.
data.content_game_1: Tree leaves usually fall a lot in the fall.
data.answer_en_hint: Tree leaves usually fall a lot in the fall.

data.trans_hint: Con người chặt cây để lấy gỗ.
data.en_hint: People cut down trees for wood.
data.content_game_1: People cut down trees for wood.
data.answer_en_hint: People cut down trees for wood.

data.trans_hint: Phân bón được dùng nhằm giúp cây phát triển nhanh hơn.
data.en_hint: They use fertilizer to stimulate tree to grow more quickly.
data.content_game_1: They use fertilizer to stimulate tree to grow more quickly.
data.answer_en_hint: They use fertilizer to stimulate tree to grow more quickly.

data.trans_hint: Có rất nhiều loại trái cây ở những vùng nhiệt đới.
data.en_hint: There is a variety of fruits in tropical regions.
data.content_game_1: There is a variety of fruits in tropical regions.
data.answer_en_hint: There is a variety of fruits in tropical regions.

data.trans_hint: Những khu rừng nhiệt đới cần được bảo tồn.
data.content_game_1: The tropical forests need preservation.
data.answer_en_hint: The tropical forests need preservation.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi tìm thấy một chồng các khúc gỗ cạnh rừng.
data.en_hint: We found a huge pile of logs beside the forest.
data.content_game_1: We found a huge pile of logs beside the forest.
data.answer_en_hint: We found a huge pile of logs beside the forest.

data.trans_hint: Cây mọc lên từ hạt giống.
data.content_game_1: Trees grow from seeds.
data.answer_en_hint: Trees grow from seeds.
